description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=0/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. Jump blocks, draw blocks, and get to the top in this intense platformer! Fall off the screen and fail, or succeed in reaching the top as fast as you can, but beware; this game is HARD!
description.short: Jump blocks, draw blocks, and get to the top in this intense platformer! Fall off the screen and fail, or succeed in reaching the top as fast as you can, but beware; this game is HARD!
